1.title: The History of Telemedicine
1.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, takes a look at the field of telemedicine, and the technology impacting health care worldwide.

2.title: What Is the Next Big Step in Medicine?
2.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, describes the technological advancements in energy and big data, and their role on the future of medicine.

3.title: How Will Energy Revolutionize Health Care?
3.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, shares some of the innovative ways energy-focused technologies are reinventing the health care system.

4.title: How Has Surgery Progressed in the Last Centuries?
4.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, describes the journey from the early days of medical surgery, to the current goal of non/invasive surgery. How close are we to achieving that dream?

5.title: How Has Technology Shaped Personalized Medicine?
5.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, details some of the incredible technological breakthroughs that are redefining medicine.

6.title: Will Robotics and Telemedicine Eliminate Surgeons?
6.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, looks at the role that physicians will play in medicine as technological advancements produce more "smart" tools.

7.title: Has Health Care Become Too Reliant on Technology?
7.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, examines the correlation between emerging medical technology, and the skillsets being taught to new health care professionals.

8.title: Should Patients Be Less Reliant on Physicians?
8.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, examines medicine's changing role in our society and our reliance on doctors.

9.title: The Future of Battlefield Medicine
9.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, assesses the necessary changes and developments that must take place to increase the success of battlefield medicine.

10.title: The Future of Prosthetics
10.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, glimpses into the future development and production of artificial limbs and organs.

11.title: What Excites You About Biologically Inspired Technology?
11.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, explains the role nature plays in the development of medical technology and practices.

12.title: The Ethics of Biologically Inspired Technology
12.plot: Dr. Richard Satava, Professor Emeritus of Surgery at University of Washington, explores the ethical issues that arise with the use of bio-technology for extending the human lifespan.

imdb.title: Curious Minds: Future Medicine
plot: Curious Minds interviews leading experts to discuss the cutting edge of innovation, from artificial intelligence to the Internet of things.
